messages.text: There is a good corporate event coming up!
Guys, I'm working on it! Have some faith!
Haha and the bad supplies! I hate working in this office so much
I am stressed as well. The office equipment is bad and makes the whole situation worse
But in the meantime I am so stressed
Haha that's a fun idea
Of course you would! you would love it!
Chris if you stopped being so mean, I would join that
Haha you should! we could start a firm together, selling everywhere!
If they close this office, my salary would be even worse! I might quit with you guys if that happens
Yeah but if they closed the office, at least we wouldn't get this terrible salary! Maybe a new job would have better pay
Haha I would miss you guys as well. Their is great team chemistry , and great corporate events. That's something that is really cool
Thanks John, that's good to hear. I would miss working with you and Tom!
It's not my decision. There is no guarantee that it will happen but we have to prepare for the possibility. If it were to happen, don't worry, I would take care of you all. I like you guys alot
I can't find another job! you can't do this!
I know, that would be the worst day of my life
Are you kidding me! That is horrible!
WHAT
I'm sorry, I wish I could help but I can't. They might close down this office
Guys I can't do anything about that in the next coming months
They really are ugly
Yes! We don't have any perks! Where is the skateboard ramp? There is none. Our offices are ugly!
All good offices have perks, and we do not! This is so bad
I wish we had perks
There are no real break areas or perks
It's just old and smelly
I know this office is bad though
You guys should never work in a bad environment!
I was so annoyed, I would leave work early just to get out!
Haha I didn't work here back then. but in my old company there were thousands of salesmen, and they were all awful!
which i never do. So i guess i'm sad most of the day
I used to sell hundreds a day, now I'm happy if I get a dozen
Yes, but it's not as good as it was back in the day
Is this your best month yet?
That's kind of a big deal
Wow congrats!
I'm so excited!
I can't say that I've added new accounts, but all of my old small clients have ordered their biggest orders yet!
my results have been very good. I sold our Advil product to all of our old clients, and signed on four more new accounts!
How have your results been guys?
I really like having you on my team it makes for great chemistry
Both of you are great salesman
I am professional too, thank you !
I am professional, and you should follow my lead
I am not!
I'm always nice! you're just always looking for trouble
when you are nice, the team chemistry is great
That's true, I love the corporate events here
But whenever there are corporate events they are very good
He makes more than us though, our pay is bad!
Yeah he doesn't make much does he?
especially with what they're paying him
John is really good, but he handles the whole global sales team and has no time for all of us
You and I are the last on the sales team, with John
It's because this whole office is forgotten
This office equipment is so old
No, because the internet is not good either
I wish the printer was better, we would have beautiful notes
Yeah that could work, thanks
I can send over meeting notes if you like?
Will do
5:00pm, central meeting room, on time
That's good, I'll take that
How's that?
Okay well you know what? Give me a time and place and I'll be there early
always late!
I'm just stating facts! Youre
Alright relax! I'm not always late! Stop being so aggressive!
5:30 is so late...you're always late! What is wrong with you
For sure, I can meet you at 5:30
Tom, let's meet at 5pm? we have to finish this fucking presentation
We will, thanks John!
In the meantime focus on your clients guys
I'll look into all of this
Alright alright
Fair enough
I can't work harder when the pay is this bad, Chris!
Why doesn't he just work harder...
If it helps...
Guys! I can get you more time for those appraisals Tom
Yes, because unlike you I take care of my small accounts very well!
Really? You don't have time even though you literally do not have ANY big clients?
I don't have time for your stupid proposals
I have four appraisals to put forward before tomorrow
Working!
What? I sent you that last week..what have you been doing?!
Um, I haven't had time
Hey tom, have you looked at the proposal I sent over?
You're welcome!
Thanks man, you're the best
Okay, I'll look into it. I can't really fix the office equipment but I can definitely try to get you more dealflow
Yeah that would be nice, to be honest. I'm often bored at this job
Okay, fine. But that's not my fault. I can try to get you some more if you like?
Yeah well I don't have any good clients...and it's not for lack of trying!
Really? That's great news!
Debra from Brisk Investments! she loves you!
Really? Who?
Well I do have one client who says you are great!
I'm so tired of my clients, they are so annoying !
I believe you, we don't make much here either
